subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Belmont Stakes
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Cigar, who died Tuesday at age 24, starred in the mid-1990s amid a 16-race winning streak, but he had a much more lasting impact on those who knew him.
